member.summary: Description of the server object configuration.

member.summary: The isolation level of the server objects defined by the server object configuration.

member.summary: Indicates whether the server objects defined by this configuration are pooled.

member.summary: The maximum number of server object instances for a server object configuration.

member.summary: The minimum number of server object instances for a server object configuration.

member.summary: Name of the server object configuration.

member.summary: Initialization parameters and properties for the server objects created by the server object configuration.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration.RecycleProperties
member.summary: The recycling properties for the server object configuration.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration.StartupType
member.summary: The startup type for this server object configuration. Startup type describes whether the server object configuration is started when the server object manager service is started for the GIS server.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration.TypeName
member.summary: Type of the server object configuration (MapServer or GeocodeServer).

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration.UsageTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (in seconds) a client can hold onto an instance of a server object for this server object configuration before releasing it back to the server. It is the maximum time allowed between calling CreateServerContext and ReleaseServerContext.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration.WaitTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (in seconds) a client will wait for an instance of a server object for this server object configuration using the CreateServerContext method on IServerObjectManager before timing out.

member.summary: Provides access to administrators to members that control the behavior and properties of a server object configuration with extensions.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectConfiguration2.CleanupTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (in seconds) that a SOC process will remain active to allow its no longer used server object threads to shut down gracefully before terminating them.

member.summary: Deserializes the server object configuration from a string.
